t:
My son always leaves handprints on the bathroom mirror,
               no matter what I tell him.
         I've to clean it everyday.



However, this time, after a few minutes of scrubbing, I realised,

   the prints were not on this side.
c:
How do I make him come inside here? This world so fascinating.



#mirror #reflection #trapped #mirrorworld #handprint #son #mischief #otherside
